it's for 32bit ?

this is exactly what it says... 64 bits xp, with some 64 bits preinstalled support...
BUT any 64 bits platform in order to secure the smooth passing from 32 bits to 64 bits...it keeps compatibility with the older 32 bits applications !
SO, because I forced the installation only of vc_redist 64 bits version... but many applications are still working under 32 bits, you have to install all 3 types of vcredist 32 bits !!! as well, to have support for those applications to have an well working 64 bits operating system able to run 32 bits applications !

that's why I've said to manually download vcredist 32 bits 2005, 2008, 2010 ...and install them !
as an example to fully understand this issue, you must know that the direct x 9 support on 64 bits operating system will detect and install BOTH 64 bits and 32 bits DX libraries... ok ? if a game does no have instructions to work on 64 bits, it will work on 32 bits engine, in spite of the 64 bits operating system ! got it ? when you install 32 bits support or applications on a 64 bits platform it will display something like "C:\Program Files (x86)\ " meaning it will install within a separate program files directory apart from the default one... that will  deal with 32 bits app.  hope you understood it this time :)
